snippet: The court is considering whether former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, convicted of tax fraud, should be placed under house arrest or allowed to fulfill his sentence with community service.
abstract: Court in Milan holds sentence hearing for former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, who was convicted of tax fraud in 2012; may place him under house arrest or allow the 77-year-old to do community service because of his age.
lead_paragraph: The court is considering whether former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, convicted of tax fraud, should be placed under house arrest or allowed to fulfill his sentence with community service.

headline.main: Italian Court Weighs Community Service for Berlusconi
headline.print_headline: Italy: Court Weighs Community Service for Berlusconi
